name: Jungle_Temple
description:
Jungle temple is a small puzzle game where your mission is to move boxes to be able to unlock the door out,  or the next level. You can try solving the storyline levels, the harder custom maps or even try to make your own in the built in mapeditor!

This is my first game that I have been working on and off for the last 3 years. It is a small game that me(the programmer) and my girlfriend (not a artist, but she have done the best she can) has been working on together. It is not a perfect game but we will continue to add some small improvements if we get the time.  The game is ment to be a fun and challenging, a game there you can make maps and challenge your friends to complete them. 

The game will create a map under your documents tab, with a maps folders. When you create a map it will create a txt file in the maps folder, that you can send to your friends. They just need to put the txt in under there maps folder and it will show up under "your" maps.  The story maps it's ment to show you diffrent ways of using the blocks so you can make you own. The custom maps is some maps made by friends of my.

We hope you like the game! /Komster and Bubblizz.
